name: Perimeter Scan (V)
Lore: '''It''s a good bet the Empire knows we''re here.''',
Text: 'If two related unique (•) sites are on table, deploy the related system from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. OR Peek at a face down card on table. OR If a character or starship''s power was just reduced, reset that card''s power to its printed power for remainder of turn.',
